content:
Update:

It seems that this should be an Issue:

The test won't pass for localized Documents folders when the system language is not English.
Makes sense so far.
Not sure if this is intended, but I don't think so?

Maybe this could be my first Isse+Pull request for the compiler? :)

C:\Documents and Settings\ and your documents folder are completely unrelated. C:\Documents and Settings\ is the legacy name for C:\Users and is never translated. For compatibility with old software it should still exist as junction to C:\Users.

Interesting, with C:\Documents and Settings\ the test won't pass with C:\Dokumente und Einstellugen\ it passes.

image.png

Interesting that the junction is called Dokumente und Einstellungen on my machine instead of Documents and Settings
